website_summaries.verdict: These kicks tick a lot of the boxes when it comes to good shoe characteristics. Jameson 2 Eco shoes are comfortable, stylish, eco-friendly, priced reasonably, and versatile. They perform well when used for different activities. They don’t let water in easily but are breathable enough for the summer.The laces are prone to breaking, and the soles can be slippery for the first few uses. However, the traction becomes better the more the shoes are used. They also give a good board feel and provide awesome grip on bike pedals.
pros: Nearly all who reviewed the Etnies Jameson 2 Eco were one in saying that the shoes are very comfortable
Some said the low-top sneakers were more padded than regular Vans footwear
Many people were happy with the style of the casual Etnies kicks which they called “rad” and “dope,” among other things
They mentioned liking the understated look
The shoes’ eco-friendliness earned praises from a lot of purchasers who were vegans/nature lovers
The Etnies Jameson 2 Eco shoes are quality footwear according to several purchasers
They commended the kicks for being reliable as everyday wear
Some consumers reported that the low-tops are durable and have lasted them at least a year of use
A small number of customers were delighted with the colorways available for these Etnies sneakers
A handful of consumers stated that the value justifies the price of the Jameson 2 Eco
A few persons noted that the low-top shoes breathe pretty well
The casual sneakers don’t let water in easily when it rains, users said
A couple of people marveled at how “incredibly light” the sneakers are
They claimed that the Etnies Jameson 2 Eco is the perfect summer shoe
The lifestyle sneakers are amazingly versatile, some buyers remarked
They said the shoes are excellent for BMX riding, hiking, skating, weightlifting, and everyday life
cons: Several people complained that the Etnies Jameson 2 Eco’s soles felt very slippery during the first couple of uses although a few did say that the grip gets better the more you rip into them
Various customers were displeased that the laces are fragile
They reported the laces breaking in as little as two weeks from first use
Some users found the kicks to be slightly narrow and short
A few testers reported hearing a squeaky sound from the soles of these low-top Etnies sneakers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, slightly too small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Used to replace some old Vans that had been kicking around for years. Soft but firm tongue, with the lace layout they can be comfortable tightened well. Strong grippy sole has stood up to liquid spills on polished concrete already...as expected from a skate shoe though. Slightly tighter fit than other manufacturers, but only very slightly: thinner socks must suffice. Practical enough to use for skating, or walking around town, but smart enough to wear on an evening out. Overall, five stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Page

customer_reviews.title: A little snug in the fit
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and well made. However my size 7 feels more like a 6.5. I expect it will “give” a bit with wear but straight out of the box they feel narrow and my toes are a little cramped. I will update review in a month or so if they relax and feel more comfortable with wear. My first impression though is I should have ordered a 7.5
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very much on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and a pair of Van's because of the great price on Amazon. Both are UK10: the van's fitted perfectly. These were pretty tight, and didn't seem quite as well made as the Van's. Returned via Amazons free label, refund given as soon as they were posted. Wouldn't be in a hurry to order again, even at a bigger size, and certainly not at the fifty plus price tag they RRP for.
customer_reviews.author: Lumosity

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, could be more durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes although they started to wear immediately. There was some ripping to the canvas but with skateboarding this is to be expected. The insole and fit is very comfortable. I already have another pair of Etnies with the sti foot bed but they are not for skating so this was my first time using it on a board. The shoe provides a good mixture of board feel and protection. I like the feeling of the insole while on the board. I doubt they would be suitable for any massive drops but for a regular mix of skating they are great. The outsole has a nice grip that keeps you on your board.
customer_reviews.author: tgw94

customer_reviews.title: Moulded nicely into shape and were very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Got the first generation of Jameson back in 2011. They lasted almost 5 years of casual wearing: Wore them around 50% of the time - just walking (i.e. no jogging, running or skating). I usually have an issue with shoes as my foot is quite wide (5") - no problem here. Moulded nicely into shape and were very comfy. Getting this new series feels very similar. Been wearing them for a few weeks and have nothing to complain about - yet! Will come back in a couple of month to re-assess and give an update.
customer_reviews.author: J.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Size bigger than other shoes, be careful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Adidas falcons at size UK 11's and they fit perfectly and are amazing to walk in. I bought a pair of these shoes at size UK 11 and the shoe feels like a 12, too much space for my toes and when I walk the back of the shoes slump and scrape against your ankles. If you're a size 11 in well fit running shoes then I'd advise getting size 10's as the shoe is comically larger than it states online.
customer_reviews.author: Millabaz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just small fittibg
customer_reviews.text: Too small, tight around instep and toes. Otherwise looked well and good quality
customer_reviews.author: ian kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly, thanks for all your work Amazon and looks good (original).
customer_reviews.author: OPIRU BONNIE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seller
customer_reviews.text: Great product (can’t go wrong with Etnies) seller has good selection of colours and delivered on time - will use again
customer_reviews.author: Guy Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Great pairbof trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Get quality ,very quick on the delivery no issue with sizing 8.5 I usually get 9 for trainers but usually they come a little big,but these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought these shoes fit ok when I first bought them but after wearing them for a week they were so uncomfortable. Would definitely not buy them in retrospect and would return them if it were possible
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Wootten

customer_reviews.title: these shoes have been my favorite. They lasted enough time
customer_reviews.text: i wish i bought a second pair. these shoes have been my favorite. They lasted enough time. The colors are great. the materialsare great. Good shoe. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes nice and comfy. I have size 10 feet and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and extremely comfortable, these could easily become an addiction :-)
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes, and fitted well
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Fit was as expected. Nice suede outside.
customer_reviews.author: John Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Originally bought them in black and wanted different colours. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They fit perfectly and look great. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: look great and keep my feet dry what else do you ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, look great and keep my feet dry what else do you need from shoes?
customer_reviews.author: Sz Vallance

customer_reviews.title: Good, slightly odd
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe that fits nice and skates well even though the bottom is kinda hard and slippery with the white rubber on the sides of my shoes kinda starting to loosen after just a week off normal usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it's all good. Top notch shoe
customer_reviews.text: Color is a bit more blue than expected from the pictures, but it's all good. Top notch shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect! Can't argue at the price either
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, fit perfect! Can't argue at the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Ross McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, super fast delivery, top notch all round 😊
customer_reviews.author: Paul Loughrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes as expected. Cope with trapsing around French forests and cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. L. S. Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I went hiking in these caught them on a sharp stone and only ripped the top layer of fabric, plus it was easy and comfortable to hike around the mountains and this was the only damage, apart from the tiny rip they still look like new
customer_reviews.author: HUGO

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Buy one bigger size than normal.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Good price. If you’re normally a UK 11 get a UK 12.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent style and quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these . I'm thinking I'll get some black ones next,but I think they on the small side of nine. I think I'll buy a ten next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great but not good for actually skating
customer_reviews.text: The shoes wore away after around 2 weeks of skating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Etnies Men's Jameson 2 Eco Skateboarding Shoes
product_meta.description: Etnies jameson 2 eco is part of our 'buy a shoe plant a tree' Scheme and is routed in skateboarding. It features a die cut eva insole, recycled rubber outsole, thinly padded tongue and collar and a faux vulc cupsole construction.
feature_bullets: Recycled Open Cell Pu Foam Insole
